notes: Sound the trumpets of war (doot doot)—the reckoning has begun. {} got hit with a snowball!
{0} wasn’t even paying attention to chat...  and they got smacked by a snowball anyways! Hey {0}—use /collect, then /throw to get ‘em back!
Thunk! {} got pelted with a snowball... you gonna take that lying down?
Pow, right in the kisser! {} got slugged by a snowball.
{} is just too quick! You missed!
A shoebill blocked your shot—damn those stinky shoebills. You missed!
*Whoosh!* You missed, but there’s always another snowball. /collect some more and show ‘em what for!
You throw a snowball with all your might, just for it to land a few inches from your feet. You missed! Maybe you should work on your arm strength a bit...

inspo.note: Since this bot is a reimplementation of Discord's Snowsgiving 2021 Snowball Bot with the mostly the same commands, though they will undergo further adjustment. Visit their [Snowball Bot FAQ]({}) for information about the original purpose, commands, and more.

code.note: I reworked quite a bit of it, but the code that I used as the base for this was by a guy named Mukesh over on GitHub. Check out the code repository for his snowball bot [here]({}). Credit to Rapptz and Umbra as well for their personal bots providing examples of discord.py implementation.
